com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class WList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWComponent
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WBeanComponent
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WRepeater
          • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AjaxTarget, BeanAware, BeanBound, BeanProviderBound, Container, DataBound, Marginable, NamingContextable, WComponent, WebComponent, Serializable

    public class WList
extends WRepeater
implements Marginable

    This component is an extension of a WRepeater that is used to render a collection of items as a list.

    The operation of this component is essentially the same as a WRepeater, but it allows for some basic control over how the repeated components are arranged.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Adam Millard, Yiannis Paschalidis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getOrCreateComponentModel

        protected WList.ListModel getOrCreateComponentModel()
        Retrieves the model for this component so that it can be modified. If this method is called during request processing, and a session specific model does not yet exist, then a new model is created. Subclasses may override this method to narrow the return type to their specific model type.
        Overrides:
        getOrCreateComponentModel in class WRepeater
